app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Reels Story Maker Temply
app_description: Temply is a video editing app tailored for creating short form content particularly designed for social media platforms. It provides easy and straightforward solutions for creators seeking the trendiest aesthetics. Create your dream video with wide selection of 600 templates 600 royalty free music soundtracks 100 stunning fonts 50 eye catching filters and 800 trendy stickers whether you re a content creator business owner marketing professional and even a personal user Temply is your one stop shop to your inspiration and efficient content creation. Unlock your creativity with Temply the ultimate template driven app that brings your ideas to life effortlessly! where cutting edge AI meets creative expression! Unleash your imagination whether you re designing social media Reels Stories TikToks or more. Our pre made templates make it a breeze to create stunning content in minutes designing captivating visuals for any occasion has never been so intelligent and intuitive. Inspiring templates: Temply offers a diverse content genres and styles for creating captivating content across social platforms like Reels TikTok and more. Uplift your content: Temply adds that final aesthetic touch making your edits much more engaging effortlessly with fonts transitions animations and high quality results. AI powered Created For You feature: Quickly generates engaging trendy videos using your personal media in a few seconds. User friendly interface: Ideal for newcomers in the world of TikTok and creating Reels Temply boasts a quick learning curve making it simple to get started. Brand focused content: It allows personalization with logos fonts and colors along with a diverse library of royalty free music for impactful content aligned with your brand s essence. All video editing features needed and beyond: A vast selection of pre made templates: Beat synced templates Reels and other social media pre made templates. Created for you Personalized videos created by AI. Transform live photos to videos. Stock footage library with unlimited stock footage. Trim and mix music and videos with ease. Slow down or speed up capabilities for media. AI background remover. Unique 50 filters and adjustments. Royalty free music soundtracks for social media and commercial usage. Import from your own iTunes collection. Text edit with 100 fonts shadows strokes color picking and more. Multi language automatic Auto Captions. Trendy 800 sticker collection. Variety of advanced transitions and dynamic effects. High quality 4K export. Share right to your social media friend and more. Business Features: Business commercial and promotion templates. Import your brand logo font colors and more. Subscribe now to enjoy all the features described above. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase or later on and at least 24 hours before the renewal date otherwise your subscriptions will renew automatically. The cost of renewal will be charged to your account in the 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. When canceling a subscription your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Auto renewal will be disabled but the current subscription will not be refunded.
